text: Otoko no haishin-sha mo on'na no haishin-sha mo, subete doruidearu. Kare-ra wa jaaku o meiji, tadashi koto o kinji,(arra no michi no tame ni tsuiyasu koto ni) sono-te o tojiru. Kare-ra wa arra o wasureruga, kare mo kare-ra o wasure rareru. Hontoni haishin-sha-tachi wa, arra no okite ni somuku-sha-tachidearu
